game.name: The Spike Cross
game.genres: Action, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Sports, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, In-App Purchases, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Remote Play Together
game.shortDescription: "바닥에 시원하게 찍어 누르는 배구의 스파이크. 직접 느끼게 해드리겠습니다." 배구를 사랑하는 인디 게임 개발자가 직접 개발한 "더 스파이크"! 배구의 최대 매력을 살리기 위해 수많은 시행착오 끝에 개발 된 스포츠 게임!
game.shortDescriptionEn: "The thrill of spiking in volleyball. Why don't you try it out?" Developed by an indie developer who loves volleyball! The sports game made after numerous trial and error to contain the appeal of volleyball!

reviewHighlights.text: even though the early game progresses really slow and boring but the end game is so fun. the spike is not that typa game where you are not guaranteed...
Better buy Hangtime than waste time over mobile app that tries to act like a PC game
